column1: Arantangi is a constituency in the Tamil Nadu legislative assembly
column3: Aranthangi in Pudukkottai district. It is part of the Ramanathapuram (Lok Sabha constituency).

column2: gave his seat up to his mentor Anbarasan
column3: who defeated Raja Paramasivam of All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam. S. Thirunavukkarasu resigned to be an MP for Pudukkottai (Lok Sabha constituency)
